hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Water Temple Compass#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##the Water Temple## has #0# major items.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Song of Time#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the way of the hero.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Water Temple Compass#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: Hoot! Hoot! Would you like me to repeat that?

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals #2 Deku Scrubs#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Strength Upgrade# and #a Bow#.
